text: @SecPompeo Lies, lies, & more lies out of this hawk! Does the pres. Bidding! Stop repeating old conspiracies! Sick of hearing from U & other Trump sycophants abt the great job(NOT)U all R doing.Trumps incompetence in full display while all yer hands swim in blood of ppl. Dying from Covid-19
